text:
Aww yeah! Today we are taking a journey to 
tropical Brazil to learn English with Rio.

If you want to keep learning with the best 
movies and TV series and finally be able to

watch them without getting lost, without 
missing the jokes, and without subtitles,

just click on the subscribe 
button and bell down below.

Like Ahmad, who has recommended our Youtube 
channel to more than 50 of his friends

who all subscribed and have had positive 
changes in their English learning journey.

If you find it confusing how we natives reduce and 
connect our words, then I have something really

special for you! In our free 3-part masterclass, 
we will teach you the three keys that will help

you to understand natives at ANY speed, which are:
Pronunciation (like you’ve seen here)

So if you are tired of feeling lost 
when you hear natives speak fast

then join that right now for free by clicking 
up here or down in the description below.

By the way, if you ever feel unnatural when 
speaking, then you might want to check out

this lesson where Andrea will teach you 55 
Common English Phrases For Daily Conversation.

Just click up here or down in the description 
below to watch that after you finish this lesson.

Hey, if you want even more learning with 
Rio, then be sure to head over to our

Instagram for an exclusive lesson, and more 
new lessons to help you with your vocabulary,

listening, grammar, and more every single day!
And next, I would recommend that you head over

to Hawaii with this fun lesson 
with the movie Lilo & Stitch!
